title: 88/160/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 January 1988 approving the aid programme for the improvement of agriculture in the region of Veneto drawn up pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1401/86 (only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 26 January 1988
approving the aid programme for the improvement of agriculture in the region of Veneto drawn up pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1401/86
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(88/160/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The aim of the programme for the improvement of agriculture drawn up by the region of Veneto and forwarded by the Italian Government on 19 January 1987, as subsequently supplemented and amended on 1 July 1987, is hereby approved in accordance with Regulation (EEC) No 1401/86.

The Italian Government shall forward to the Commission, by not later than the expiry of the first two years of application of the programme, an amendment to it containing further details for assessing the measures provided for in respect of subsequent years.

The Italian Government shall in addition inform the Commission of progress in completion of the programme being carried out in the region of Veneto in a two-yearly summary report on the measures carried out, those in hand and those planned, together with a table as shown in the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 January 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
